item.title: Aspose.PDF for .NET 20.12
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.PDF for .NET 20.12. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PDFNET-43479 Validating PDF signature with LTV validation New Feature PDFNET-49153 PDF to ODS file conversion New Feature PDFNET-49038 Add support for exporting PDF files to XLSM New Feature PDFNET-48804 Cannot add 4-byte characters to PDF New Feature PDFNET-49018 Reading the large set of random data (masked as PDF document) lead to hangs on Aspose.
